question.text:
One of the reaction that takes place in producing steel from iron ore is the reduction of iron(II) oxide by carbon monoxide to give iron metal and CO 2 .
FeO s  + CO g  ⇌ Fe s  +  CO 2 g ; K P  = 0.265 atm at 1050 K. What are the equilibrium partial pressures of CO and CO2 respectively at 1050 K if the initial partial pressures are: Pco=1.4 atm and PCO2=0.80 atm ?

options.text: <math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>1.739</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.461</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>

<math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>17.39</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.461</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>

<math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>1.79</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.46</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>

<math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2.739</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1.461</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>

solution.text:
KP=0.265=0.8-x1.4+x
On solving, x = 0.339
∴PCO=1.739  atm and PCO2=0.461 atm
